description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Let your imagination run wild with 2D World Creator. Use themed blocks sets, including medieval and futuristic, to create your own world. Place wiring to create circuits and manipulate objects with electricity. You can even wire two futuristic transporters together to travel instantaneously between them. A world of creation sits in your hands waiting for you to shape it to your will.
description.short: Let your imagination run wild with 2D World Creator. Use themed blocks sets, including medieval and futuristic, to create your own world. Place wiring to create circuits and manipulate objects with electricity. You can even wire two futuristic transporters together to travel instantaneously between them. A world of creation sits in your hands waiting for you to shape it to your will.
